price: Whoever comes with a good deed will be rewarded with better than it, and they will be safe from the horror of that Day.
arabic: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهَا وَهُم مِّن فَزَعٖ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ءَامِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
